Total time doing physical activity is a **computed factor**. It means that it can be determined with total certainty from the user input.

#### Alternative names:
* Phys. total
* Physical total
* Total physical activity time
* Total time doing physical activity
* PhysicalTotal

#### Input

Total time doing physical activity is computed with the following factors

* [Medium physical activity time](/model/PhysicalMedium)
* [Hard physical activity time](/model/PhysicalHard)

#### Uses

Total time doing physical activity is used by the model in the following places

* [Colon cancer](/model/ColonCancer)
* [Coronary heart disease](/model/Ischemic)
* [Stroke](/model/Stroke)


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Total time doing physical activity is 5. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is possible to change, and it can be changed now or very soon.*
